Sketching.title: Pencil Perception
rules: Only 1 student per class can participate.
Registrations for all events will be taken through the Gandhaar App only.
Registration forms submitted through the app will be considered final. No changes will be made under any circumstances.
Theme will be declared 1 week prior to the competition.
A3 Drawing sheets will be provided by the College.
Participants are required to bring their own stationary.
Use of Phone/Internet is strictly prohibited.
Only pencils, black pens, color pencils, and black sketch pens are allowed.
The artist must submit their sketches within a maximum time limit of 90 minutes.
Winners will be given merit certificates and participants will be getting participation E-certificates.
The decision of the judges will be final and binding.
Winners will be announced during the Prize distribution ceremony. (3rd February 2024, 6:00 PM)
